name: Proximo One
description: As Gordon Surefire research in his space station, he gets interrupted by an evil space warlord Sinastrax to completely wipe out the human race and take over the milky way! As you being the only spaceman to know about such a situation, it is up to you to eradicate the alien spawn and swarms of infected ships coming to invade! Fight through many planet systems! Defeat the infected alien ships as they try to take over your space base! Defend humanity in a thrilling shooter to protect one self and eradicate the alien race and to also defeat Sinastrax of his evil trenches one and for all!
